DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate the effects of genetic polymorphisms on pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic interactions of clopidogrel and cilostazol in Korean healthy adult volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Genetic Polymorphism on Interactions of Clopidogrel and Cilostazol in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject whose CYP2C19 genotype was determined Subject who has abnormal laboratory test results
